page.title: 16Village games today
page.content: Football is by far the most popular game amongst the boys in the village.We play in school in the playground and down the park with the bigger boys. Sixty is a game that we play at night.It is very like 'hide and seek'.We have all sorts of hiding places round the village. Sometimes we go into the woods and play Geronimo.It is an adventure game where we hide up trees and behind bushes.There is a bike track out of the village.My friend and I made it up.It goes through the limeworks and over a field.We have a lot of fun doing 'times trials' there.
